text: USS Seawolf may refer to: * , renamed before launching, was the lead ship of her class. Commissioned in 1913, she ran aground and sank in 1920 * was a . Commissioned in 1939, she was successful during World War II until she was lost to friendly fire in 1944 * was the second nuclear submarine. She was commissioned in 1957 and stricken in 1987 * is the lead ship of her class. She was commissioned in 1997 and is currently in active service ==See also== * , including the SSN-21 * Seawolf (disambiguation) Category:United States Navy ship names
